name: kitlet-project
description: Group project (inc Umayr, Aaron and Tony)

scripts.seed:prod: NODE_ENV=production DATABASE_URL=$(heroku config:get DATABASE_URL) knex seed:run
scripts.migrate-latest:prod: NODE_ENV=production DATABASE_URL=$(heroku config:get DATABASE_URL) knex migrate:latest
scripts.migrate-rollback:prod: NODE_ENV=production DATABASE_URL=$(heroku config:get DATABASE_URL) knex migrate:rollback
